dailyFunStuff.title: Thanking Nurses
dailyFunStuff.content:
Crown Perth and The West Australian have teamed up to launch a $250,000 campaign to thank nurses in WA Hospitals. Our healthcare professionals have done a fantastic job and deserve all the praise they get!

Read more about the campaign below!

citation.name: Crown Perth and The West Australian launch $250,000 campaign to thank hero nurses during pandemic â€“ The West Australian
